original_title: Fátima o el Parque de la Fraternidad
overview: Fiction film based on the homonymous short story by Miguel Barnet, which tells the story of Fatima, the Queen of the night. The film tells the life of a young homosexual and transvestite, who prostitute to earn a living, and also to maintain economically to the man whom he loves, and who must face all the complexities arising from its decisions.
title: Fatima, Queen of the Night
